message_1: What is the median of the following data set: [10, 5, 8, 12, 14, 6, 9, 15, 18, 13]?
message_2:
To find the median of the data set, first arrange the numbers in ascending order:

[5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 12, 13, 14, 15, 18]

Since there are 10 numbers in the data set (an even number), the median will be the average of the two middle numbers (5th and 6th numbers).

Median = (10 + 12) / 2 = 22 / 2 = 11

The median of the data set is 11.
